title: Interactive Online Workshop for Strengthening Mathematics Coaching Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (secondary education level)
context.additional_context: A group of administrators/leaders requiring leadership and pedagogical skills acquisition for performing the role of math coaches.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three customized feedback strategies for math coaching tailored to different learner proficiency levels.
Learners can complete at least 80% of practical assignments and perform peer evaluations using Zoom-based interactive tools.
Within 48 hours after training, learners can submit one math coaching scenario applicable to real-world work environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
